Brain death

Brain death (See brain stem death testing ). Humoral responses following death:

Catecholamine storm leading to depletion of catecholamines.

Endocrine consequences of brain death:

↓ ACTH ↓ cortisol

↓ TSH ↓ thyroxine

?↑ insulin

↓ ADH - Diabetes insipidus.

Treatment:

DDAVP

Thyroxine

Methylprednisolone

?insulin
